title: Maizad 3D Digital Pedometer with Clip, Simple Walking Step Counter for Men Women Kids, Track Steps and Miles/Km Calories Burned & Activity Time 7 Days Memory (Black)
description: Maizad Simple Pedometers 3D Walking Step Counter With Carabiner ClipFeatures:- No computers or apps required.- 3D pedometer, steps, distance, calories, daily target, 7 day memory log.- Just put it in pocket or hang it on a keychain, walk or run your way to better health.- Designed with simplicity and ease of use for everyone that wants an accurate Step Counting 3D Pedometer.- It tracks steps, miles/meter, calories, minutes and shows the time of day. it has a error correction feature.- Pedometer auto sleeps when you are not moving and auto wakes and counts steps when you start moving again.- It is perfect for everyone including children to stay motivated for a workout. you can also conveniently hook the pedometer to a dog collar for outdoor activities.Specification:- Pedometer Size: 7.6 cm x 4.5 cm x 1 cm / 3 x 1.7 x 0.4 inch- Pedometer Weight: 2 oz / 60 g- Battery Type: CR2032 Button Battery- Battery Life: Up to 12 monthsPackage Included:1 x Pedometer1 x Instruction Manual
